ygData.msgSnippet: ... shell ... Stronghold put himself in the way and took the shots. Give up, you cannot beat all of us, you pathetic lackeys! Stronghold says. Blender stands

> Breakdown smiles to himself.  "Ha, is right!" he yelled, firing another
shell
> off at Blender.

Stronghold put himself in the way and took the shots.

"Give up, you cannot beat all of us, you pathetic lackeys!" Stronghold says.
Blender stands up with a soft groan.

"What happened?" Blender asked.

> Pyro stumbled back from Deemos' shots, firing a 'continous' blast of
flames
> at Stronghold.

Stronghold was burnt massively. He angrily pushed through the flames, not
caring about his well being, he was going to smash this bot! He pushed
through the burnign agonizing flames and moved close to Pyro, firing off a
large missile from his back (Like Bonecrusher) at Pyro.

> Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Stronghold's left knee from his
cannon.

Stronghold never ecen knew it because of the burning flames, but the fusion
blasts smashed into his leg.

> Scavenger fired 25 explosive shells from his rifle at Shapredge.  Turning
to
> see the grenades, he jumped to the side, doing a cartwheel as the grenades
> explode.  He lifts his left arm, blocking all the shrapnel and laughing.

Rizopas throws a charge to each side of Scavenger, hoping that he'd run into
one if he tried to escape, since he couldn't fly.

> Dark Claw fired off two more missiles from his attack vehicle mode at the
> Mafia base.  He would put the squeeze on that pathetic base.

Base damage: The base is struck but nothing much happens, but the last small
autoguns fall off, only 2 large autoguns remain, but they fire at the
Alliance.
